addons.name: Fingerless Parade Gloves
addons.description:
Part of the standard Clown apparel, the cut fingers allow for dexterous manipulations.
- **Increases** the Throw speed of **Bottles** by **+25 %**.
- **Reduces** the Throw angle of **Bottles** by **-15 Â°**.

addons.name: Party Bottle
addons.description:
Be the life of the party!
- **Bottles** emit confetti when they break in addition to their usual effects.
- Hitting Survivors directly with a **Bottle** grants **100** bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.

addons.name: Robin Feather
addons.description:
A warm orange feather, soft to the touch.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down duration between successive **Bottle** throws by **-40 %**.

addons.name: VHS Porn
addons.description:
An all time classic.
You will not see things quite the same again.
- Switches the colours of the Gas Clouds with one another.

addons.name: Kerosene Can
addons.description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.
- Survivors affected by **Intoxication** suffer from the **Blindness** **Status Effect** for **30 seconds**.

addons.name: Solvent Jug
addons.description:
A chemical volatile compound that irritates the respiratory tract, but increases absorption of the Afterpiece Antidote.
- **Increases** the **Invigoration** duration by **+1 second**.

addons.name: Starling Feather
addons.description:
A black feather with an emerald gloss, very soft to the touch.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down duration between successive **Bottle** throws by **-50 %**.

addons.name: Sticky Soda Bottle
addons.description:
It's sugary sweet, with only a little blood on the label.
- **Increases** the strength of the **Haste** **Status Effect** from **Invigoration** by **+2 % **.

addons.name: Thick Cork Stopper
addons.description:
A sturdy cork fitting the Afterpiece Tonic Bottles marvellously.
- **Reduces** the Reload time of the **Bottles** by **-0.5 seconds**.

addons.name: Bottle of Chloroform
addons.description:
A sweet-smelling organic compound with strong anaesthetic capabilities.
- **Increases** the size and spread of the **Intoxication** Gas Clouds by **+20 %**.

addons.name: Flask of Bleach
addons.description:
A potent chemical which causes irritation, burns and lung damage.
- **Increases** the strength of the **Hindered** **Status Effect** Survivors suffer from during **Intoxication** by an additional **-4 %**.

addons.name: Smelly Inner Soles
addons.description:
A mouldy inner sole which gives much comfort to tired feet.
- **Increases** your Movement speed while reloading **Bottles** by **+66 %**.

addons.name: Spirit of Hartshorn
addons.description:
A pungent chemical compound consisting of ammonia.
One whiff is enough to jolt even the most sluggish of minds.
- **Increases** the size and spread of the **Invigoration** Gas Clouds by **+20 %**.

addons.name: Sulphuric Acid Vial
addons.description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.
- Survivors affected by **Intoxication** suffer from the **Mangled** **Status Effect** for **70 seconds**.

addons.name: Cheap Gin Bottle
addons.description:
When the night is rough and the day is rougher, a little hair of the dog will give you a boost.
- **Increases** the strength of the **Haste** **Status Effect** from **Invigoration** by **+3 % **.

addons.name: Cigar Box
addons.description:
A grim and incomplete collection of fingers.
Fills The Clown with longing and focuses his chemical crafting abilities.
- The Auras of all other Players within **16 metres** of their location are revealed to **Invigorated** Players for **6 seconds**.

addons.name: Ether 15 Vol%
addons.description:
A highly volatile organic compound, toxic at this concentration.
- **Increases** the **Intoxication** duration by **+1 second**.

addons.name: Garish Make-Up Kit
addons.description:
Some for the face and some for the Antidote.
The unknown compound intensifies the Antidote's effect.
- **Increases** the **Invigoration** duration by **+2 seconds**.

addons.name: Redhead's Pinkie Finger
addons.description:
The prized pinkie finger of a redhead.
Faintly fragrant.
Tastes of potpourri and varnish.
- Survivors hit directly by **Bottles** suffer from the **Exposed** **Status Effect** for as long as they are affected by **Intoxication**.
- **Reduces** the number of carried **Bottles** to **1**.
- This number cannot be modified by other Add-ons.

addons.name: Tattoo's Middle Finger
addons.description:
The prized middle finger of a large tattooed man.
Has a faint taste of machinery oil.
- The Auras of Survivors afflicted by either **Intoxication** or **Invigoration** are revealed to you for **6 seconds**.

addons.name: Bear Oil
addons.description:
Melted animal fat that can lubricate the Bear Traps squeaky joints.
- Setting a **Bear Trap** is silent.

addons.name: Makeshift Wrap
addons.description:
A scratched and worn brace made of thick, cured animal skin.
- You are no longer caught in your own **Bear Traps**, they are automatically disarmed instead.

addons.name: Padded Jaws
addons.description:
These padded jaws are meant to restrain, not to wound.
- **Bear Traps** immobilise Survivors without damaging them.
- Grants **100 %** bonus Bloodpoints for trapping Survivors.

addons.name: Trapper Gloves
addons.description:
Protective padded leather gloves.
- **Increases** the Setting speed of the **Bear Trap** by **+30 %**.

addons.name: 4-Coil Spring Kit
addons.description:
A replacement kit for Bear Traps which changes the usual dual spring system to four coil springs, adding a great amount of strength to the Bear Traps hold.
- **Increases** the Disarm time of the **Bear Trap** by **+33 %**.

addons.name: Coffee Grounds
addons.description:
An old rusted can containing damp coffee grounds.
- **Increases** the strength of the **Haste** **Status Effect** after setting a **Bear Trap** by **+5 % **.

addons.name: Lengthened Jaws
addons.description:
Jaws with long teeth that dig further into the flesh than a conventional Bear Traps.
- Survivors who escape from **Bear Traps** suffer from the **Deep Wound** **Status Effect**.

addons.name: Serrated Jaws
addons.description:
These replacement trap jaws have saw-like blades, causing awful open wounds when they snap.
- Survivors injured by a **Bear Trap** suffer from the **Haemorrhage** **Status Effect** until fully healed.
"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."

addons.name: Wax Brick
addons.description:
A block of wax used to lower friction and facilitate movement in mechanical parts.
- **Increases** the Rescue and Escape times of the **Bear Trap** by **+33 %**.

addons.name: Fastening Tools
addons.description:
A specialised set of tools used to fasten Bear Traps to ensure their effectiveness.
- **Increases** the Rescue and Escape times from the **Bear Trap** by **+25 %**.
- **Increases** the Setting speed of the **Bear Trap** by **+50 %**.

addons.name: Rusted Jaws
addons.description:
These Bear Trap jaws are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots, making injuries particularly difficult to heal.
- Survivors injured by a **Bear Trap** suffer from the **Mangled** **Status Effect** for **70 seconds**.

addons.name: Secondary Coil
addons.description:
A secondary coil keeps the Bear Trap functional in times when the primary coil becomes unusable.
- **Increases** the Disarm time of the **Bear Trap** by **+50 %**.

addons.name: Tar Bottle
addons.description:
A black, matte and sticky substance that when applied to Bear Traps, makes them far less noticeable.
- **Darkens** the **Bear Trap**.

addons.name: Trapper Bag
addons.description:
A cured leather waist bag.
Large and sturdy to transport hunting equipment.
- **Increases** the number of carried **Bear Traps** by **+1**.

addons.name: Honing Stone
addons.description:
When used with the Bear Trap, the stone sharpens its blades.
The razor-sharp blades inflict deep wounds aimed at bleeding the victim as fast as possible.
- Survivors caught in a **Bear Trap**,  who free themselves, are inflicted with the Dying State

addons.name: Oily Coil
addons.description:
A clear oil that makes handling the Bear Trap's spring more hazardous.
- Resetting a **Bear Trap** reveals the Aura of the last Survivor to have disarmed it for **5 seconds**.

addons.name: Tension Spring
addons.description:
A high tension spring that snaps back into place after being stretched.
- Automatically resets the **Bear Trap** **2 seconds** after a Survivor escaped from it.

addons.name: Trapper Sack
addons.description:
A crude leather sack suitable for foraging.
- Causes all **Bear Traps** to be carried in your inventory at the beginning of the Trial.
- You can no longer pick up any placed **Bear Traps**, only reset them.

addons.name: Bloody Coil
addons.description:
Part sticky, part slippery, this grim liquid makes handling the Bear Traps spring more dangerous.
- When a healthy Survivor disarms a **Bear Trap**, the **Bloody Coil** exacts its price, putting the Survivor into the Injured State.

addons.name: Iridescent Stone
addons.description:
Bear Traps sharpened with the sickly gleaming stone seem to gain a life of their own.
- Automatically resets and arms a random disarmed **Bear Trap** every **30 seconds**.

addons.name: Choclo Corn
addons.description:
A type of corn common in South America.
A few kernels are reason enough for a crow to stop for a snack.
- **Increases** the Timer before idle **Dire Crows** disintegrate by **+2 seconds**.

addons.name: Oil Paints
addons.description:
There is little left but a few globs of black and grey, yet Carmina could paint an expansive landscape with them.
- **Increases** the Detection radius of Killer Instinct by **+1.5 metres**.

addons.name: Thick Tar
addons.description:
Sticky, viscous sludge that Carmina used for an experimental piece.
Once it sticks to skin, it is nearly impossible to get off.
- **Increases** the Repel duration for Swarmed Survivors by **+0.5 seconds**.

addons.name: Vibrant Obituary
addons.description:
Scrap newspaper, speckled with bright, eye-catching paint.
It seems tragedy is a daily thing.
- **Increases** the duration of Killer Instinct by **+3 seconds**.

addons.name: Automatic Drawing
addons.description:
An experimental drawing Carmina made without conscious planning.
Do not think â act.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment by **-1.5 seconds** after idle **Dire Crows** disintegrate.

addons.name: Festering Carrion
addons.description:
A stomach-churning pile of meat and guts, yet it attracts hungry crows craving a bite.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment by **-0.5 seconds** after launching **Dire Crows**.

addons.name: Still Life Crow
addons.description:
An ink drawing of a dead crow.
Carmina's sadness over its death can be felt with each dark line.
- **Increases** the Timer before idle **Dire Crows** disintegrate by **+4 seconds**.

addons.name: Untitled Agony
addons.description:
A canvas that was targeted with swipes and trashes of black paint following Matias' death.
It radiates with heavy, crippling sorrow.
- Swarmed Survivors suffer from a **-15 %** **Hindered** **Status Effect** for **1.5 seconds**.

addons.name: Velvet Fabric
addons.description:
A striking red fabric Carmina used on an art project.
Its brightness contrasted against black feathers.
- The Auras of Swarms continue to be revealed to you for another **1.5 seconds** after Survivors start repelling them.

addons.name: Charcoal Stick
addons.description:
A stick of charcoal that conceals anything it rubs over.
- The Auras **Dire Crows** mid-flight are no longer visible to Survivors.
- The Auras of **Dire Crows** are visible to Survivors for **0.5 seconds** after summoning them.

addons.name: Darkest Ink
addons.description:
An unnatural ink, so wretched and dark that it seems to pull in light around it.
- Swarmed Survivors suffer from the **Blindness** **Status Effect**.
- This effect lingers for **15 seconds** after repelling the Swarm.

addons.name: O Grief, O Lover
addons.description:
An abstract ink drawing that Carmina drew before walking to the Death Leap.
- Swarmed Survivors suffer from the **Exhausted** **Status Effect**.

addons.name: Silver Bell
addons.description:
A shiny trinket that a crow took a liking to.
The clinking of the bell was a distraction to everyone but Carmina.
- Swarmed Survivors suffer from the **Oblivious** **Status Effect**.

addons.name: Thorny Nest
addons.description:
A nest that remained empty near Carmina's home.
There are sharp thorns embedded in it.
- Survivors suffer from the **Haemorrhage** and **Mangled** **Status Effects** for **70 seconds** after being damaged by **Dire Crows**.

addons.name: Ink Egg
addons.description:
An unusual egg that seems to be nothing but a ball of semi-solid ink.
- **Increases** the number of summonable **Dire Crows** by **+1**.
- **Reduces** the Timer before idle **Dire Crows** disintegrate by **-2 seconds**.
"Perhaps, covered in darkness as I was, they saw me as one of their own." â Carmina Mora

addons.name: Matias' Baby Shoes
addons.description:
A grieving reminder to Carmina that Matias would be with her, always watching.
- The Auras of Survivors within **5 metres** of idle **Dire Crows** are revealed to you for **3 seconds**.
"See you soon, Matias." â Carmina Mora

addons.name: Severed Hands
addons.description:
Carmina's severed hands, cut from her arms shortly before her death.
The sight brings sheer fury to her and her protectors.
- Causes Survivors coming within **3 metres** of Swarmed Survivors to become swarmed too.
"How are you going to paint now?" â Hooded Man

addons.name: Severed Tongue
addons.description:
Carmina's tongue, cut from her mouth shortly before her death.
The sight instils rage not just in her, but in her crows.
- **Reduces** your Slow-down time by **-0.5 seconds** after launching **Dire Crows**.
"How are you going to tell poems now?" â Hooded Man

addons.name: Garden of Rot
addons.description:
A nude self-portrait in which Carmina depicts a rotting darkness growing outwards from within.
- Survivors suffer from the **Exposed** **Status Effect** for **4 seconds** after repelling the Swarm.
"I see no salvation in the rot." â Carmina Mora

addons.name: Iridescent Feather
addons.description:
A glass-like feather moulded from The Fog itself.
Simple as it may be, it is a symbol of those who watch over Carmina.
- Grants the **Undetectable** **Status Effect** when Birds of Torment is on Cool-down and you hold no **Dire Crows**.
- **Reduces** the number of summonable **Dire Crows** by **-1**.
"They saved me when I could not save myself." â Carmina Mora

addons.name: Bog Water
addons.description:
Murky water contained in a glass pill bottle from another time.
- **Reduces** the Trigger range of **Phantasm Traps** by **-10 %**.

addons.name: Dead Fly Mud
addons.description:
A small lump of mud, black with the remains of flies.
Devoured to increase stamina.
- **Increases** the Teleport range to tripped **Phantasm Traps** by **+10 %**.

addons.name: Powdered Eggshell
addons.description:
Minuscule eggshell fragments shimmering with a pale golden hue.
- **Increases** the Tripped duration of **Phantasm Traps** by **+20 %**.

addons.name: Rope Necklet
addons.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants.
- **Increases** the Setting speed of **Phantasm Traps** by **+10 %**.

addons.name: Bloodied Water
addons.description:
Tainted water contained in a folded water lily leaf.
- **Reduces** the Trigger range of **Phantasm Traps** by **-20 %**.

addons.name: Cypress Necklet
addons.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with crudely attached cypress bark and swamp moss.
- **Increases** the Setting speed of **Phantasm Traps** by **+15 %**.

addons.name: Dragonfly Wings
addons.description:
A handful of yellowish wings, dry and crisp.
Devoured to increase stamina.
- **Increases** the Teleport range to tripped **Phantasm Traps** by **+12.5 %**.

addons.name: Half Eggshell
addons.description:
One half of a perfectly round hollow eggshell.
- **Increases** the Tripped duration of **Phantasm Traps** by **+25 %**.

addons.name: Pussy Willow Catkins
addons.description:
A handful of small, pristine flower clusters covered in a fine greyish fur.
- The Auras of Survivors tripping **Phantasm Traps** are revealed to you for **3 seconds**.

addons.name: Bloodied Mud
addons.description:
A handful of mud with veins of deep crimson.
The bloody layers empower the mud.
- **Reduces** the Trigger range of **Phantasm Traps** by **-30 %**

addons.name: Cracked Turtle Egg
addons.description:
A pale orange turtle egg, cracked and emptied of its content.
- **Increases** the Tripped duration of **Phantasm Traps** by **+30 %**.

addons.name: Dried Cicada
addons.description:
A large swamp cicada covered in a fine layer of ash; crispy.
Devoured to increase stamina.
- **Increases** the Teleport range to tripped **Phantasm Traps** by **+15 %**.

addons.name: Swamp Orchid Necklet
addons.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with withered orchid petals and leaves.
- **Increases** the Setting speed of **Phantasm Traps** by **+20 %**.

addons.name: Willow Wreath
addons.description:
Three frail willow branches attached to form a triangular wreath.
- The Auras of Survivors tripping **Phantasm Traps** are revealed to you for **5 seconds**.

addons.name: Disfigured Ear
addons.description:
The cannibal village deaf boy's ear.
Deformed due to several hits to the head.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power:
- Survivors suffer from the **Deafened** **Status Effect** for **6 seconds** after triggering a **Phantasm Trap**.

addons.name: Grandma's Heart
addons.description:
The cold heart of the cannibal village elder.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Whenever Survivors trigger **Phantasm Traps**, you benefit from the following effects for their tripped duration:
- **Suppresses** your Terror Radius.
- **Doubles** the range of the Fake Terror Radius emitted by the **Mud Phantasms** to **16 metres**.

"Bring me another slice of the girl." â Grandm

addons.name: Rusty Shackles
addons.description:
Shackles once used to hold prisoners and carcasses in the cannibal village cellar.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
- **Suppresses** any indication to Survivors that they tripped **Phantasm Traps**.
- **Suppresses** the creation of **Mud Phantasms**.

addons.name: Scarred Hand
addons.description:
The cut up, severed hand of the cannibal village butcher.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
- Grants collision with Survivors to both **Phantasm Traps** and the **Mud Phantasms**.
- Grants **+300 %** bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
- Disables your ability to teleport to tripped **Phantasm Traps**.
Scarred Hand trumps all other Add-ons.

"..." â The Butche

addons.name: Mint Rag
addons.description:
A small piece of cotton torn from the dress worn by Lisa Sherwood on the day she disappeared.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
- Press the Active Ability button to teleport to any untripped **Phantasm Trap** anywhere in the environment.
Mint Rag has a cool-down of **10 seconds**.

addons.name: Waterlogged Shoe
addons.description:
A child's shoe, long lost in the bog's waters.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
- **Increases** your default Movement speed by **+7.5 %** to **4.73 m/s**.
- Survivors suffer from a **-9 %** **Hindered** **Status Effect** within the Trigger range of **Phantasm Traps**.
- Disables your ability to teleport to tripped **Phantasm Traps**.

addons.name: Chipped Monocle
addons.description:
A monocle Talbot rarely used despite his eyesight weakening in later years.
- Unlocks the ability to see the Target location of a Slam.

addons.name: Compound Seven
addons.description:
This early sample failed to achieve desired results, but demonstrated surprising effects regardless.
- Causes you to automatically face the nearest Survivor within **16 metres** of your location after a Slam.

addons.name: Foxglove
addons.description:
A poisonous plant that sparked Talbot's interest in chemistry.
It rekindles deeply buried memories.
- **Reduces** the duration of Fatigue by **-0.25 seconds**.

addons.name: Placebo Tablet
addons.description:
A pill that is utterly ineffective... or is it?
- **Reduces** your Movement speed during a Rush by **-15 %**.
- Grants **+100 %** bonus Bloodpoints for Rush Score Events.

addons.name: Blighted Rat
addons.description:
A rat that briefly returned to life when injected with Putrid Serum, becoming aggressive and uncontrollable.
- **Increases** your Movement speed during a Rush by a stack-able **+2 %** for each consecutive Lethal Rush.

addons.name: Canker Thorn
addons.description:
A sizeable thorn snipped from a Visceral Canker.
It secretes a mild toxin.
- **Reduces** the duration of Fatigue by **-0.5 seconds**.

addons.name: Plague Bile
addons.description:
A sample of bile from **The Plague** distilled and treated with a mixture of chemicals.
- **Increases** the Turn rate during a Rush by **+10 %**.

addons.name: Pustula Dust
addons.description:
Dried **Pustula Petals** ground into a fine dust.
- **Increases** the duration of the Chain Rush Window by **+0.75 seconds**.

addons.name: Shredded Notes
addons.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0The remnants of Talbot's notes, they still contain some valuable information within.
- **Reduces** the Recharge time per Power Token by **-0.33 seconds**.

addons.name: Adrenaline Vial
addons.description:
A hormone removed from an unwilling subject's adrenal gland.
Though it provides a jolt of energy, it can fatigue its user.
- **Increases** the number of available Power Tokens by **+2**.
- **Increases** your Movement speed during a Rush by **+5 %**.
- **Increases** your maximum Look angle during a Rush by **+20 Â°**.
- **Reduces** your Turn rate during a Rush by **-0.5 Â°/s**.
"Please, don't do this..."

addons.name: Blighted Crow
addons.description:
A dead crow that has been grotesquely mutated by Putrid Serum.
- **Increases** your Movement speed during a Rush by a stack-able **+3 %** for each consecutive Lethal Rush.

addons.name: Compound Twenty-One
addons.description:
A serum that's fatal to humans.
It evokes beneficial qualities in those who are... something more.
- The Auras of Survivors within **8 metres** of a Slam are revealed to you for **3.5 seconds**.

addons.name: Rose Tonic
addons.description:
A mixture made with dried roses from the exceedingly rare **New Moon Bouquet**.
- **Increases** the duration of the Chain Rush Window by **+1 second**.

addons.name: Umbra Salts
addons.description:
Regular sea salt that has momentarily passed through the Spirit World, altering its properties in the process.
- **Increases** the Turn rate during a Rush by **+15 %**.

addons.name: Alchemist's Ring
addons.description:
A ring given to chemists graduating from the London School of Medicine.
It is a reminder of unrestrained ambition.
- **Extends** the Rush duration by **+20 %** for each consecutive Lethal Rush.
"The student is accused of grave-robbing with the intent of unsanctioned scientific testing." â Faculty Reprimand of Talbot Grimes, 1838

addons.name: Soul Chemical
addons.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A chemical squeezed from the pineal gland of a recently deceased Survivor.
- **Increases** the initial Movement speed of a Rush by **+5 %**.
"...suspected to cause atypical alterations in neural rhythmic activity." â Unlabelled Mystery School Tex

addons.name: Summoning Stone
addons.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0Talbot used this stone to carve what he believed was his research into the Opium Den's walls.
- **Increases** the initial duration of a Rush by **+0.5 seconds**.
"Death is only the beginning.

addons.name: Vigo's Journal
addons.description:
The journal of a man who claimed to have returned from The Void.
The knowledge within has practical applications.
- Grants the **Undetectable** **Status Effect** during a Rush.
"In a wasteland of forgotten dreams and endless routine, the man with a way out is God." â Talbot Grimes

addons.name: Compound Thirty-Three
addons.description:
Talbot's penultimate attempt at a serum.
Though it did not facilitate his escape, it did have powerful side effects.
- **Increases** your Turn rate during a Rush by **+33 %**.
- **Increases** the duration of a Rush by **+33 %**.
- **Reduces** the number of available Power Tokens to **3**.
"Time is scarce. Let this be the one..." â Talbot Grimes

addons.name: Iridescent Blight Tag
addons.description:
A glass-like laboratory tag, moulded from The Fog itself.
Either a gift from The Entity or a cruel jest to tag The Blight as he once did to others.
- Blighted Corruption is capped at **3 Tokens**.
- **Increases** your Movement speed during a Rush by **+20 %**.
- **Increases** your maximum Look angle during a Rush by **+20 Â°**.
"Progress requires drastic change." â Talbot Grimes

addons.name: Cat Figurine
addons.description:
A wooden figure that had caught young Victor's eye.
He shrieked until his mother stole it from the market, nearly blowing their cover.
- Unlocks the ability to see the Target location of a Pounce.

addons.name: Soured Milk
addons.description:
A metal bottle filled with milk that has since soured.
Loud as Victor could be, he quieted down when presented with his meal.
- **Increases** the Shriek radius of **Victor** by **+2 metres**.

addons.name: Tiny Fingernail
addons.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0Charlotte had many ways to mourn Victor's death.
As the fingernails loosened from his rotting hands, she took one in remembrance.
- **Reduces** the Unbinding time of **Victor** by **-0.25 seconds**.

addons.name: Toy Sword
addons.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A minuscule toy sword, only a few inches long.
Holding it brought out a violent enthusiasm in Victor.
- **Reduces** the Charge time of a Pounce by **-0.1 second**.

addons.name: Baby Teeth
addons.description:
Two teeth that Victor lost long ago.
They are unusually sharp.
- Survivors suffer from the **Blindness** **Status Effect** for **30 seconds** after removing **Victor**.

addons.name: Bloody Black Hood
addons.description:
A hood from one of the men that hunted Charlotte.
Soon, he became the prey.
- **Reduces** the Transition time when switching back to **Charlotte** by **-0.5 seconds**.

addons.name: Cat's Eye
addons.description:
An eyeball that belonged to a cat eaten by the starving Deshayes family.
Victor hid it from his mother, using it as a toy.
- **Suppresses** all noise made by **Victor** while holding a Pounce.

addons.name: Ceremonial Candelabrum
addons.description:
The candelabrum that Victor tipped over, causing his captors to burn.
A symbol of his tenacity.
- **Increases** the Crushing time of **Victor** by **+0.2 seconds** when controlling **Charlotte**.

addons.name: Madeleine's Glove
addons.description:
A glove once owned by The Twins' mother.
During desperate times, it was held over Victor's mouth to keep him from making a peep.
- **Increases** the Shriek radius of **Victor** by **+4 metres**.

addons.name: Madeleine's Scarf
addons.description:
A cloth Madeleine wore shortly before her death.
The Twins kept it as a memento.
- **Increases** your Movement speed when controlling **Victor** by **+0.3 m/s**.
"...shall hereby be recorded as a service to the greater good and the extermination of evil." â Inquiry into the Death of Madeleine Deshayes

addons.name: Rusted Needle
addons.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A needle Madeleine used to sew up her children's tattered clothes.
- Survivors hit with a Pounce Attack suffer from the **Haemorrhage** **Status Effect** until fully healed.

addons.name: Sewer Sludge
addons.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A disgusting, sticky mixture that covered the Deshayes during an escape attempt through the city sewers.
- **Reduces** the Crawling speed of downed Survivors with **Victor** attached to them by **-25 %**.

addons.name: Stale Biscuit
addons.description:
A hard, unleavened biscuit that Madeleine stole from a town's market.
It was not much, but it was better than most meals.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down time of a Pounce by **-0.4 seconds**.

addons.name: Weighty Rattle
addons.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him.
It is entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.
- Survivors hit with a Pounce Attack suffer from the **Broken** **Status Effect** for **60 seconds**.

addons.name: Drop of Perfume
addons.description:
One of the few luxuries Madeleine escaped her past life with.
It has a pleasant, disarming scent.
- Survivors suffer from the **Oblivious** **Status Effect** within **Victor's** Shriek range when controlling **Charlotte**.
"Beware the deceit of witches, for they exploit the goodness in men's hearts." â A History of Witches and Demons, 1602

addons.name: Forest Stew
addons.description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.
- **Increases** your Movement speed when controlling **Victor** by **+0.6 m/s**.
"Eat... eat, child. You'll feel better when it's down." â Madeleine Deshayes

addons.name: Spinning Top
addons.description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own.
He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.
- Causes Survivors hit with a Pounce to drop any carried Item.
"Hush... hush... it is yours then." â Charlotte Deshayes

addons.name: Victor's Soldier
addons.description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared.
Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.
- The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for **6 seconds** after crushing **Victor** when controlling **Charlotte**.
"Kch--kchâk'ull bawd mennn..." â Victor Deshayes

addons.name: Iridescent Pendant
addons.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A glass-like pendant moulded from The Fog itself.
There is a portrait of Madeleine Deshayes upon it, though something about her depiction seems unsettling.
- Successful Pounce Attacks grant a stack-able **+2 %** **Haste** **Status Effect** to both **Victor** and **Charlotte**, up to a maximum of **+8 %**.
- This effect is reset when a Survivor enters the Dying State by any means.
"Your binding is no curse, my loves. It is your strength to draw upon." â Madeleine Deshaye

addons.name: Silencing Cloth
addons.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A coarse strip of cloth that a five-year-old Charlotte would put in her mouth.
Stopped her from screaming when witch hunters were nearby.
- Whenever **Victor** is crushed, **Charlotte** is granted the **Undetectable** **Status Effect** for **20 seconds**.
"I don't like this game anymore, Mother..." â Charlotte Deshaye

addons.name: Chainsaw File
addons.description:
A file whose purpose is to hone Chainsaw chains.
- **Reduces** the duration of a Tantrum by **-0.5 seconds**.

addons.name: Spark Plug
addons.description:
A clean spark plug fitted for a Chainsaw.
- **Reduces** the Power Recharge time by **-0.5 seconds**.

addons.name: Speed Limiter
addons.description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.
- Grants **+100 %** bonus Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
- Survivors hit with Bubba's Chainsaw are only damaged for a single Health State.

addons.name: Vegetable Oil
addons.description:
A rancid oil used as a poor quality lubricant.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down duration of Bubba's Chainsaw by **-0.3 seconds**.

addons.name: Chilli
addons.description:
A big bowl of steaming Chilli to keep you fresh and strong.
- **Increases** the duration of the Chainsaw Dash by **+0.25 seconds** per consumed Token.
- **Increases** the duration of the Chainsaw Dash Window by **+0.25 seconds**.
"I got some good barbecue here!" â Drayton Sawyer

addons.name: Homemade Muffler
addons.description:
A makeshift exhaust system made of black gas pipes.
- **Reduces** the duration of a Tantrum by **-1 second**.

addons.name: Knife Scratches
addons.description:
Scratches cover the Chainsaw's body, caused by a searing blade.
Memories of reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.
- **Increases** the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Dash by **+2 %**.
- **Increases** the Power Charge time by **+12 %**.

addons.name: Long Guide Bar
addons.description:
A sturdy iron replacement bar for long chains.
- **Increases** the threshold before Revving triggers a Tantrum by **+2 seconds**.

addons.name: Primer Bulb
addons.description:
Pumps more gas in the ignition system to ensure a quick and powerful start.
- **Reduces** the Power Recharge time by **-1 second**.

addons.name: Begrimed Chains
addons.description:
This chain is stained with a foul substance that debilitates anyone it touches.
- Causes Survivors hit by Bubba's Chainsaw to drop any carried Item.

addons.name: Grisly Chains
addons.description:
A chain with unusually hefty cutter teeth that leaves victims crippled even after being healed.
- Survivors hit by Bubba's Chainsaw suffer from the **Mangled** **Status Effect** for **70 seconds**.

addons.name: Shop Lubricant
addons.description:
An oil specifically formulated for Chainsaws.
A special additive prevents oil throw off.
- The Auras of Survivors downed by Bubba's Chainsaw, if no other Survivors were within the Terror Radius, are hidden to other Survivors for **20 seconds**.

addons.name: The Beast's Marks
addons.description:
Jagged marks cover the Chainsaw's body, punishment from the dark beast that lives in The Fog.
Memories of violent reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.
- **Increases** the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Dash by **+3 %**.
- **Increases** the Power Charge time by **+12 %**.

addons.name: The Grease
addons.description:
A thick yellowish ooze, concocted by the Sawyers.
Used for all-purpose lubrication around their house.
- **Increases** the threshold before Revving triggers a Tantrum by **+3 seconds**.

addons.name: Award-winning Chilli
addons.description:
A big bowl of spicy Chilli made famous thanks to prime meat.
- **Increases** the duration of the Chainsaw Dash by **+0.5 seconds** per consumed Token.
- **Increases** the duration of the Chainsaw Dash Window by **+0.5 seconds**.
"The secret's in the meat" â Drayton Sawyer

addons.name: Depth Gauge Rake
addons.description:
A tool that increases the angle of the depth gauge, making the chain eat more "wood".
- **Increases** the Power Tokens by **+1**.
- **Reduces** the Power Charge speed by **-18 %**.
- **Reduces** the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Dash by **-2 %**.

addons.name: Light Chassis
addons.description:
A light and durable Chainsaw chassis with a shorter guide bar.
Makes the Chainsaw easier to handle.
- The Auras of Survivors within **8 metres** are revealed to you while revving Bubba's Chainsaw.

addons.name: Rusted Chains
addons.description:
This chain is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.
- Survivors hit by Bubba's Chainsaw suffer from the **Broken** **Status Effect** for **90 seconds**.

addons.name: Carburettor Tuning Guide
addons.description:
A crudely drawn guide to properly adjust and tune a Chainsaw carburettor.
- Automatically consumes all Tokens when starting a Chainsaw Dash, adding up their durations.
- **Increases** the duration of the Chainsaw Dash by **+0.5 seconds** per consumed Token.
- **Reduces** the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Dash by **-2 %**.
- **Reduces** the Power Recharge rate by **-0.28 c/s**.

addons.name: Iridescent Flesh
addons.description:
A thin slice of smooth, young flesh.
The veins shimmer with luminescent glow, as if life still flows within.
- Instantly recharges all Power Tokens after hitting a Survivor with Bubba's Chainsaw.
- **Reduces** the maximum duration of a Tantrum to **5 seconds**.
"There are moments when we cannot believe that what is happening is really true.
Pinch yourself and you may find out that it is." â Pam Jones

addons.name: "Calm" - Class I
addons.description:
An ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.
With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause mild anxiety in the patient.
- **Increases** your Terror Radius by **+4 metres** while Static Blast is ready to be used.
- **Reduces** your Terror Radius by **-4 metres** while Static Blast is on cool-down.
Survivors affected by **Madness** suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

- **Madness II**: Survivors intermittently hear a distant **Illusionary Terror Radius**.
- **Madness III**: Survivors constantly hear a distant **Illusionary Terror Radius**.

addons.name: "Order" - Class I
addons.description:
A conventional ECT procedure, part of a patient's daily routine at the LÃ©ry's Memorial Institute.
Can cause a state of mild confusion in the patient.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down duration of Static Blast by **-2 seconds**.
Survivors affected by **Madness** suffer from the Affliction of Order:

- **Broken Pallets** are randomly replaced by dropped or upright **Illusionary Pallets**, which persist until approached by Survivors.
- New **Illusionary Pallets** are generated every **20 seconds**.
You share into your patients' **Madness** and can see the **Illusionary Pallets**.

addons.name: Maple Knight
addons.description:
A white knight chess piece made of maple.
This gift from an old man brings back distant memories and imbues The Doctor with devastating focus.
- Grants the ability to see the Area of Effect of the Shock Therapy Attack.

addons.name: Mouldy Electrode
addons.description:
A mouldy electrode which can nevertheless conduct a weak electrical current.
- **Extends** the Area of Effect of the Shock Therapy Attack by **+2 metres**.

addons.name: "Calm" - Class II
addons.description:
A risky ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.
With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause moderate anxiety in the patient.
- **Increases** your Terror Radius by **+6 metres** while Static Blast is ready to be used.
- **Reduces** your Terror Radius by **-6 metres** while Static Blast is on cool-down.
Survivors affected by **Madness** suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

- **Madness II**: Survivors intermittently hear a distant **Illusionary Terror Radius**.
- **Madness III**: Survivors constantly hear a distant **Illusionary Terror Radius**.

addons.name: "Discipline" - Class II
addons.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at high voltage.
Can cause a state of moderate paranoia in the patient.
- **Reduces** the Detonation delay of the Shock Therapy Attack by **-0.1 seconds**.
Survivors affected by **Madness** suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

- **Madness II**: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an **Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius**, as if you were constantly right behind them.
- This effect lingers for **6 seconds** after the Chase ends.
- **Madness III**: In any situation, Survivors perceive an **Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius**, as if you were constantly right behind them.
You share into your patients' **Madness** and can see the **Illusionary Red Stain**.

"We re-educate our patients with the greatest care." â LÃ©ry's Memorial Institut

addons.name: "Order" - Class II
addons.description:
A high stimulus ECT procedure, part of a patient's daily routine at the LÃ©ry's Memorial Institute.
Can cause a state of moderate confusion in the patient.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down duration of Static Blast by **-4 seconds**.
Survivors affected by **Madness** suffer from the Affliction of Order:

- **Broken Pallets** are randomly replaced by dropped or upright **Illusionary Pallets**, which persist until approached by Survivors.
- New **Illusionary Pallets** are generated every **20 seconds**.
You share into your patients' **Madness** and can see the **Illusionary Pallets**.

"Side effects are very rare." â LÃ©ry's Memorial Institut

addons.name: "Restraint" - Class II
addons.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog.
Uses a wavelength that links the patient's and The Doctor's minds.
This procedure is known to cause mild cases of hallucination in the patient.
- The Auras of Survivors who have their **Madness** increased by one Tier are revealed to you for **1 second**.
Survivors affected by **Madness** suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

- **Increases** the duration of **Illusionary Doctors** by **+6 seconds**.
You share into your patients' **Madness** and can see the **Illusionary Doctors**.

addons.name: Polished Electrode
addons.description:
A like-new standard electrode equipment to conduct electro-convulsive treatments.
- **Extends** the Area of Effect of the Shock Therapy Attack by **+3 metres**.

addons.name: "Discipline" - Class III
addons.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at very high voltage.
Can cause a state of serious paranoia in the patient.
- **Reduces** the Detonation delay of the Shock Therapy Attack by **-0.15 seconds**.
Survivors affected by **Madness** suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

- **Madness II**: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an **Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius**, as if you were constantly right behind them.
- This effect lingers for **6 seconds** after the Chase ends.
- **Madness III**: In any situation, Survivors perceive an **Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius**, as if you were constantly right behind them.
You share into your patients' **Madness** and can see the **Illusionary Red Stain**.

"Respect of our patients is at the core of our principles." â LÃ©ry's Memorial Institut

addons.name: "Restraint" - Class III
addons.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog.
Uses a high stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and The Doctor's minds.
This procedure is known to cause serious cases of hallucinations in the patient.
- The Auras of Survivors who have their **Madness** increased by one Tier are revealed to you for **2 seconds**.
Survivors affected by **Madness** suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

- **Increases** the duration of **Illusionary Doctors** by **+6 seconds**.
You share into your patients' **Madness** and can see the **Illusionary Doctors**.

addons.name: High Stimulus Electrode
addons.description:
An experimental electrode that can withstand very high charges for a longer period of time.
- **Extends** the Area of Effect of the Shock Therapy Attack by **+4 metres**.

addons.name: Interview Tape
addons.description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing an unedited interview of a victim.
Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.
- Reshapes the Area of Effect of the Shock Therapy Attack from a cone into a narrow beam that is **2 metres** wide and **24 metres** long.

addons.name: Scrapped Tape
addons.description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing mostly white noise.
Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.
- Reshapes the Area of Effect of the Shock Therapy Attack from a cone into a hollow ring which is placed **8 metres** in front of you, and has an outer radius of **4.2 metres** and an inner radius of **3 metres**.

addons.name: "Calm" - Carter's Notes
addons.description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.
Uses a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.
With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure causes uncontrollable fear and anxiety in the patient.
- **Increases** your Terror Radius by **+8 metres** while Static Blast is ready to be used.
- **Reduces** your Terror Radius by **-8 metres** while Static Blast is on cool-down.
Survivors affected by **Madness** suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

- **Madness II**: Survivors intermittently hear a distant **Illusionary Terror Radius**.
- **Madness III**: Survivors constantly hear a distant **Illusionary Terror Radius**.
"Higher quality seizures trigger catatonia. At least it gives me **peace** for the time it lasts." â Herman Carter

addons.name: "Discipline" - Carter's Notes
addons.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.
The intolerably high voltage leaves the patient in a severe state of paranoia.
- **Reduces** the Detonation delay of the Shock Therapy Attack by **-0.2 seconds**.
Survivors affected by **Madness** suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

- **Madness II**: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an **Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius**, as if you were constantly right behind them.
- This effect lingers for **6 seconds** after the Chase ends.
- **Madness III**: In any situation, Survivors perceive an **Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius**, as if you were constantly right behind them.
You share into your patients' **Madness** and can see the **Illusionary Red Stain**.

"To avoid relapse from our most tenacious subjects, use **maximum** levels when proceeding with disciplinary actions." â Herman Carte

addons.name: "Order" - Carter's Notes
addons.description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.
The long, constant stimulus leaves the patient in a state of severe confusion.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down duration of Static Blast by **-6 seconds**.
Survivors affected by **Madness** suffer from the Affliction of Order:

- **Broken Pallets** are randomly replaced by dropped or upright **Illusionary Pallets**, which persist until approached by Survivors.
- New **Illusionary Pallets** are generated every **20 seconds**.
You share into your patients' **Madness** and can see the **Illusionary Pallets**.

"The stimulus must be kept active at a **convulsive** level." â Herman Carte

addons.name: "Restraint" - Carter's Notes
addons.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog, crudely annotated.
Uses an unbearable stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and The Doctor's minds.
This procedure is known to cause severe cases of hallucinations in the patient.
- The Auras of Survivors who have their **Madness** increased by one Tier are revealed to you for **3 seconds**.
Survivors affected by **Madness** suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

- **Increases** the duration of **Illusionary Doctors** by **+6 seconds**.
You share into your patients' **Madness** and can see the **Illusionary Doctors**.

"I CAN SEE THEIR DISGUSTING **ILLNESSES**." â unsighned Notes, likely Herman Carte

addons.name: Iridescent King
addons.description:
A glass-like king chess piece moulded from The Fog itself.
The Entity's trace reverberating within can break the most powerful minds.
Survivors affected by **Madness** suffer simultaneously from the Afflictions of Calm, Discipline, Order, and Restraint:
- Survivors intermittently hear a distant **Illusionary Terror Radius**.
- During a Chase, Survivors perceive an **Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius**, as if you were constantly right behind them.
- **Madness II**: This effect lingers for **6 seconds** after the Chase ends.
- **Madness III**: This effect is constant, regardless of whether the Survivors are being chased or not.
- **Broken Pallets** are randomly replaced by dropped or upright **Illusionary Pallets**, which persist until approached by Survivors.
- New **Illusionary Pallets** are generated every **20 seconds**.
- **Increases** the duration of **Illusionary Doctors** by **+6 seconds**.

You share into your patients' **Madness** and can see the **Illusionary Doctors, Red Stain, and Pallets**.
"Gazing into the iridescent glass is plunging one's self into madness." â Herman Carte

addons.name: Iridescent Queen
addons.description:
A glass-like queen chess piece moulded from The Fog itself.
It cannot be touched without receiving a considerable jolt of electricity.
Survivors struck by either the Shock Therapy Attack or a Static Blast acquire a lingering Static Charge, unless they are within **4 metres** of another Survivor:
- The Static Charge remains with the Survivor until it is discharged.
- Charged Survivors who come within **4 metres** of another Survivor trigger an automatic Shock Therapy Attack, shocking both Survivors and automatically discharging any remaining Static Charges.

"Once we have established an effective method of treatment, we can focus on its efficient means of delivery." â Herman Carte

addons.name: Counterweight
addons.description:
Adds weight to the base, for stability.
- **Reduces** the initial Turn rate of the Chainsaw during a Chainsaw Sprint by **-70 %**.

addons.name: Cracked Primer Bulb
addons.description:
A button that clears air from the fuel lines.
This machine needs to be fed.
- **Increases** the Charge rate of the Overdrive Meter by **+15 %**.
- Survivors hit with the Chainsaw are only damaged for a single Health State.

addons.name: Dad's Boots
addons.description:
A pair of trusty boots, pulled from the corpse of Max Thompson Senior.
- **Increases** the Turn speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by **+30 %**.

addons.name: Steel Toe Boots
addons.description:
Boots with a reinforced toe that offer protection from impact.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by **-10 %**.

addons.name: Clogged Intake
addons.description:
Modifying the airflow is key to modifying the Chainsaw's power.
- **Extends** the duration of **Overdrive** by **+15 %**.

addons.name: Greased Throttle
addons.description:
A lubricated trigger.
One twitch of the finger brings the Chainsaw back to life.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down time after using the Chainsaw by **-5 %**, when not in **Overdrive**.

addons.name: Off-Brand Motor Oil
addons.description:
Affordable oil that can be used to lubricate noisy chains.
- **Increases** the Charge rate of the Overdrive Meter by **+15 %**.

addons.name: Spiked Boots
addons.description:
Boots with strapped-on pieces of metal which burrow into mud for more stability and control with each step.
- **Increases** the Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by **+45 %**.

addons.name: Thermal Casing
addons.description:
A thicker case that allows the user to control the conservation of energy.
- **Reduces** the Dissipation speed of the Overdrive Meter when not using the Chainsaw by **-20 %**.

addons.name: Begrimed Chains
addons.description:
A foul yet oddly familiar chain, coated with something unpleasant.
- Survivors hit with the Chainsaw suffer from the **Haemorrhage** and **Mangled** **Status Effects** for **70 seconds**.

addons.name: Discarded Air Filter
addons.description:
A cracked and dusty filter.
It still manages to work better than the stock model.
- **Increases** the Decay delay for the Overdrive Meter by **+20 %**.

addons.name: Low Kickback Chains
addons.description:
A specialised chain that reduces the likelihood of kickback.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by **-15 %**.

addons.name: Ragged Engine
addons.description:
Some would say it needs a tune-up.
Max would say it is tuned-up.
- **Reduces** the Dissipation speed of the Overdrive Meter when not using the Chainsaw by **-30 %**.

addons.name: The Thompsons' Mix
addons.description:
A special oily substance used in the lubrication of all machinery concocted by the Thompsons themselves.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down time after using the Chainsaw by **-10 %**, when not in **Overdrive**.

addons.name: Apex Muffler
addons.description:
A masterfully crafted chainsaw muffler that outperforms all others.
- **Silences** the Chainsaw for all Survivors outside of the Terror Radius.

addons.name: Filthy Slippers
addons.description:
Max sometimes struggled to hear his mother's footfalls.
- Gain the **Undetectable** **Status Effect** until you stop sprinting after maintaining a Chainsaw Sprint for at least **2 seconds**.

addons.name: High-Speed Idler Screw
addons.description:
A loosened screw will bring more power to the Chainsaw
- **Increases** the Decay delay for the Overdrive Meter by **+30 %**.

addons.name: LoPro Chains
addons.description:
Light chains that decrease the weight of the Chainsaw, allowing for greater manoeuvrability.
- **Allows** you to continue the Chainsaw Sprint after breaking a Pallet or Breakable Wall with the Chainsaw.
- Survivors hit with the Chainsaw within **5 seconds** of breaking a Pallet or a Breakable Wall are only damaged for a single Health State.

addons.name: Iridescent Engravings
addons.description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body representing the dark beast that lives in The Fog.
Fills the user with determination.
- **Increases** your Movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by **+20 %**.
- **Increases** the Charge time of the Chainsaw by **+12 %**.

addons.name: Tuned Carburettor
addons.description:
Despite being caked in dirt and oil, this carburettor has been well adjusted.
- **Increases** the Charge speed of the Chainsaw by **+20 %**.
- **Reduces** your Movement speed to **4.4 m/s**.

addons.name: Cabin Sign
addons.description:
The cabin where both Tomoko and Reiko watched the tape.
Carries the memory of those first curses.
- **Reduces** the time it takes for TVs to turn back on after Projection by **-4.5 seconds**.

addons.name: Mother's Mirror
addons.description:
A mirror from Sadako's mother's house.
A reminder of what Sadako has lost.
- **Increases** the duration of your intermittent Invisibility after Manifesting by **+2 seconds**.

addons.name: Old Newspaper
addons.description:
It tells of a local woman who predicted a volcanic eruption, evidence used to initially find Sadako.
- **Increases** the duration of your full Invisibility after Manifesting by **+33 %**.

addons.name: Videotape Copy
addons.description:
A copy of the deadly videotape imprinted upon by Sadako.
It dampens the desire for vengeance.
- **Extends** the radius around TVs within which Survivors gain Condemned from Projection by **+2 metres**.

addons.name: Clump of Hair
addons.description:
Once beautiful and long, Sadako now hides behind her ragged, matted locks.
- **Reduces** the threshold for full Invisibility while Demanifested by **-4 metres**.

addons.name: Reiko's Watch
addons.description:
The watch that Reiko left her son Yoichi.
A distracting and constant reminder of one's impending doom.
- **Increases** the duration of your full Invisibility while Demanifested by **+25 %**.

addons.name: Sea-Soaked Cloth
addons.description:
The hood worn by the mysterious figure in the tape.
Makes those near it unable to trust what they see.
- Survivors suffer from the **Blindness** **Status Effect** when within **8 metres** of powered TVs.
- This effect lingers for **7 seconds** after turning off a **TV**.

addons.name: Well Stone
addons.description:
A piece of the well where Sadako was trapped, an image burned into the mind of all those who have watched the tape.
- **Reduces** the time it takes for TVs to turn back on after Projection by **-7 seconds**.

addons.name: Yoichi's Fishing Net
addons.description:
The net Yoichi used while fishing with his grandfather.
A reminder that death comes to us all.
- Survivors suffer from the **Blindness** **Status Effect** after acquiring at least **4 Stacks** of Condemned.

addons.name: Bloody Fingernails
addons.description:
Sadako's bloody fingernails, lost as she tried to claw her way out of the well.
Evidence of her single-minded need to kill.
- **Increases** the Speed Boost duration after Projection by **+50 %**.

addons.name: Mother's Comb
addons.description:
The comb Sadako's mother used in the tape.
Sadako's psychic abilities are enhanced when she focuses on it.
- Highlights the Auras of all turned-off TVs in **yellow**.
- Causes **TVs** being turned off to trigger a Loud Noise Notification.

addons.name: Rickety Pinwheel
addons.description:
A pinwheel found in the caves of Izu Oshima.
It spins even when there is no wind, disorienting those who see or hear it.
- Survivors suffer from the **Oblivious** **Status Effect** when within **8 metres** of powered TVs.
- This effect lingers for **7 seconds** after turning off a **TV**.

addons.name: Ring Drawing
addons.description:
A drawing of the view from inside the well, as drawn by a young Yoichi.
Helping those cursed by the tape can only bring misfortune.
- Hooking a Survivor carrying a VHS Tape causes all other Survivors to gain **+1 Stack** of Condemned.

addons.name: Well Water
addons.description:
Water from the well where Sadako was left to die.
Murky and black, it obscures everything around it.
- **Increases** the duration of the **Undetectable** **Status Effect** by **+2 seconds** after Manifesting by any means.

addons.name: Distorted Photo
addons.description:
Those who have watched the tape find all photos of themselves distorted, a reminder of their impending doom.
- Causes all Survivors within **16 metres** of your location who witness your Manifestation to scream and reveal their Auras for **4 seconds**.
"Why is it only you were saved?" â Sadaoka Yamamura

addons.name: Tape Editing Deck
addons.description:
The editing deck used by Reiko and Ryuji to analyse and copy the tape.
Copying and sharing the tape is the only way to survive the curse.
- Causes all Survivors start the Trial with a VHS Tape.
- All Survivors must bring their **VHS Tape** to the TV that is farthest from their current location.
- The Auras of Survivors inserting a VHS Tape into a **TV** are revealed to you for **6 seconds**.
"Frolic in brine, goblins be thine." â Message hidden in Sakado's Tape

addons.name: Telephone
addons.description:
After watching the video, victims receive a phone call.
They are frozen in fear as they realise they have seven days left to live.
- Survivors suffer from a **-3 %** **Hindered** **Status Effect** for **3 seconds** when Manifesting within **7 metres** of them.
"I saw a weird video the other day... after it ended, someone called us. Some kind of prank call." â Tomoko Oishi

addons.name: VCR
addons.description:
The original VCR that played Sadako's Tape.
It is still warm to the touch.
- Causes all TVs to play the Projection Effects when using Projection.

addons.name: Iridescent Videotape
addons.description:
The original tape containing Sadako's curse.
- Projection no longer turns off TVs, but also no longer applies any Condemned.
- **Increases** the time required for **TVs** to turn back on after having been turned off by Survivors by **+20 %**.
"That video... It's not of this world. It's Sadako's rage." â Ryuji Takayama

addons.name: Remote Control
addons.description:
A remote for the VCR at the cabin.
It allows Sadako to focus on those enemies at a distance.
- The Auras of all Survivors within **12 metres** of powered TVs are revealed to you for **7 seconds** after using Projection.
"She killed a man just by willing him dead. That's power of a different order from her mother." â Ryuji Takayama

addons.name: Garden Rake
addons.description:
A small claw rake, a must have tool for any accomplished gardener.
Switches the type of **Dream Traps** used in the Trial:
- Start the Trial with **7** **Dream Pallets**

addons.name: Kid's Drawing
addons.description:
An unattributed drawing clearly crafted by a young child.
- Grants **200** **Bloodpoints** in the Deviousness Category when a Survivor triggers a **Dream Snare**.
- **Reduces** the Movement Speed penalty inflicted by **Dream Snares** by **-10 %**.

addons.name: Sheep Block
addons.description:
A white and blue wooden block depicting two woolly Lambs grazing and the letter "S".
- Survivors interacting with a **Dream Trap** suffer from the **Blindness** **Status Effect** for **60 seconds**.

addons.name: Wool Shirt
addons.description:
A small boy's orange and yellow striped shirt. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Jesse".
- **Increases** the Penalty for failing Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by **-4 %**.

addons.name: Cat Block
addons.description:
A white and purple wooden block depicting a sleeping Cat and the letter "C".
- Using Dream Projection triggers Killer Instinct for **4 seconds** on all Survivors within **16 metres** of the Generator you teleported to.

addons.name: Green Dress
addons.description:
A little girl's green dress with a silky white ribbon.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:
- The Auras of Survivors failing Repairing or Healing Skill Checks are revealed to you for **3 seconds**.
- **Increases** the Penalty for failing those Skill Checks by **-4 %**

addons.name: Nancy's Sketch
addons.description:
A crude and bold sketch made with Fusain, signed by Nancy H.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down duration of Dream Projection by a stack-able **-2 %** for each asleep Survivor, up to a maximum of **-8 %**.

addons.name: Outdoor Rope
addons.description:
Sturdy outdoor rope, handy to tie up anything.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effect:
- **Increases** the audible range of their Repair noises by **+8 metres**

addons.name: Prototype Claws
addons.description:
A home-made tool to facilitate bush trimming.
Switches the type of **Dream Traps** used in the Trial:
- Start the Trial with **7** **Dream Pallets**.
- The Auras of Survivors interacting with **Dream Pallets** are revealed to you for **4 seconds**

addons.name: Blue Dress
addons.description:
A little girl's pale blue dress with white lace which's front is ruined by large cuts.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:
- The Auras of Survivors failing Repairing or Healing Skill Checks are revealed to you for **4 seconds**.
- **Increases** the Penalty for failing those Skill Checks by **-4 %**

addons.name: Jump Rope
addons.description:
A long Double-Dutch jump rope, stained with many years of use.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effect:
- **Increases** the volume of Grunts of Pain of injured Survivors by **+50 %**

addons.name: Nancy's Masterpiece
addons.description:
A painting of a Character, made by Nancy Holbrook at Badham and kept as a treasure memory.
- **Reduces** the Cool-down duration of Dream Projection by a stack-able **-3 %** for each asleep Survivor, up to a maximum of **-12 %**.

addons.name: Paint Thinner
addons.description:
A tin of a highly volatile and inflammable material.
Switches the type of **Dream Traps** used in the Trial:
- Start the Trial with **7** **Dream Pallets**.
- The Auras of Survivors interacting with **Dream Pallets** are revealed to you for **6 seconds**

addons.name: Unicorn Block
addons.description:
A white and red wooden block depicting a prancing Unicorn and the letter "U".
- Survivors interacting with a **Dream Trap** suffer from the **Blindness** **Status Effect** for **90 seconds**.

addons.name: "Z" Block
addons.description:
A deeply scratched and burnt wooden block which's only recognisable feature is the letter "Z".
- Using Dream Projection triggers Killer Instinct for **6 seconds** on all Survivors within **16 metres** of the Generator you teleported to.

addons.name: Class Photo
addons.description:
A large photograph taken at Badham Preschool showing the cheerful class of '94-95.
When channelling Dream Projection, the following effects apply:
- All Generators spew blood.
- **Suppresses** the appearance of the **Husk**.

You can no longer cancel Dream Projection

addons.name: Pill Bottle
addons.description:
An empty pill bottle which once contained a medicine called Zoneral.
- **Reduces** the threshold for intermittent Invisbility to a range of **12 to 24 metres**.
- **Reduces** the threshold for full Invisibility to a distance of **24 metres**.
- This effect also applies when carrying a Survivor.

addons.name: Swing Chains
addons.description:
Rusty, but sturdy chains used to securely attach a swing seat.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effect:
- **Increases** the volume of Footsteps of Survivors by **+50 %**

addons.name: Black Box
addons.description:
A black cardboard box filled with photographs.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effect:
- **Blocks** opened Exit Gates for **15 seconds**

addons.name: Red Paint Brush
addons.description:
A large paint brush, wet with crimson paint.
- All Survivors start the Trial asleep.
- Survivors can no longer wake up by failing Skill Checks.

addons.name: Blond Hair
addons.description:
A single slightly wavy blond hair.
- **Increases** the duration of Evil Within III by **+10 seconds**.
- **Increases** the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to **150 %**.

addons.name: Boyfriend's Memo
addons.description:
A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover.
- **Increases** the reach of Lunge Attacks while in Evil Within I by **+50 %**.
"The note is signed: D."

addons.name: Memorial Flower
addons.description:
A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone.
- **Increases** your Stalk rate by **+11 %**.

addons.name: Tacky Earrings
addons.description:
A very cheap piece of jewellery made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material.
- **Increases** your Movement speed by **+10 %** while Stalking.

addons.name: Dead Rabbit
addons.description:
A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail.
- **Reduces** your Terror Radius by **-25 %** while in Evil Within II.
- **Increases** your Terror Radius by **+25 %** while in Evil Within III.

addons.name: Glass Fragment
addons.description:
A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object.
It is impossible to determine its origin.
- The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for **3 seconds** after stalking them for at least **1 second** while in Evil Within I.

addons.name: Hair Brush
addons.description:
A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair.
- **Increases** the duration of Evil Within III by **+20 seconds**.
- **Increases** the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to **150 %**.

addons.name: Jewellery
addons.description:
A large necklace made of beads an inexpensive metals.
One of Judith's favourites.
- **Increases** your Movement speed by **+20 %** while Stalking.

addons.name: Reflective Fragment
addons.description:
A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror.
- The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for **2 seconds** after stalking them for at least **1 second** while in Evil Within II.

addons.name: Hair Bow
addons.description:
A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair.
- **Increases** the duration of Evil Within III by **+30 seconds**.
- **Increases** the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to **150 %**.

addons.name: J. Myers Memorial
addons.description:
A glossy page ripped from the 1965 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers.
- **Increases** your Stalk rate by **+25 %**.

addons.name: Jewellery Box
addons.description:
A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored.
- **Increases** your Movement speed by **+30 %** while Stalking.

addons.name: Judith's Journal
addons.description:
A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers.
Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings.
- **Increases** your Stalk rate on your **Obsession** by **+40 %**.

addons.name: Mirror Shard
addons.description:
A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror.
- The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for **5 seconds** after stalking them for at least **1 second** while in Evil Within II.

addons.name: Lock of Hair
addons.description:
A cut lock of blond hair bunched with a black elastic.
- **Increases** the duration of Evil Within III by **+40 seconds**.
- **Increases** the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to **200 %**.

addons.name: Scratched Mirror
addons.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object.
- The Auras of all Survivors within **32 metres** of your location are revealed to you while Stalking.
- Evil Within can no longer progress past Tier I.
- Grants **+200 %** bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category for Hit Score Events on top of the regular Bloodpoints granted in the Brutality Category.

addons.name: Tombstone Piece
addons.description:
A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone.
- Grants the ability to kill healthy and injured Survivors by your own hands while in Evil Within III.
- Killing a Survivor drains the Power Gauge by **-200 %**, but not past Evil Within II.
- **Increases** the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to **250 %**.

addons.name: Vanity Mirror
addons.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it.
- The Auras of all Survivors within **16 metres** of your location are revealed to you while Stalking.
- Evil Within can no longer progress past Tier II.
- Grants **+150 %** bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category for Hit Score Events on top of the regular Bloodpoints granted in the Brutality Category.

addons.name: Fragrant Tuft of Hair
addons.description:
A tuft of blond hair which was forcefully torn off someone's scalp.
Releases hints of feminine floral fragrance.
- Grants unlimited duration to Evil Within III.
- **Increases** the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to **300 %**.

addons.name: Judith's Tombstone
addons.description:
A large and heavy granite tombstone stolen from Mt. Sinclair cemetery, belonging to Judith Myers.
- Grants the ability to kill healthy and injured Survivors by your own hands while in Evil Within III.
- **Increases** the threshold to reach Evil Within III for the first time to **300 %**.
- **Reduces** your Movement speed by **-9 %** while in Evil Within III.
"Here lies our beloved daughter."

addons.name: Adi Valente Issue 1
addons.description:
An original copy of the first issue of **Adi Valente**, the comic her father made while Adriana was a child.
- **Reduces** the Success Zone size of Skill Checks for Claw-Trapped Survivors by **-20 %**.

addons.name: High-Current Upgrade
addons.description:
A wider cable with low resistance that allows faster recharging of batteries.
- **Increases** the Tracking duration of the Radar by **+1 second**.

addons.name: High-Power Floodlight
addons.description:
A sudden and overwhelming light that discombobulates anyone foolish enough to approach.
- Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the **Blindness** **Status Effect**.

addons.name: Ultrasonic Speaker
addons.description:
A high-frequency noise blaster that fills the sonic spectrum with disorienting sounds, making it impossible for observers to pick out more important noises.
- **Reduces** the duration of the immunity to consecutive Scan-Line Hits for Survivors to **75 %** of its default value.

addons.name: Adaptive Lighting
addons.description:
The Drone takes account of the surrounding area and casts lights in a bewildering manner that obscures movement.
- **Increases** the duration of the **Undetectable** **Status Effect** by **+20 %**.

addons.name: Low-Power Mode
addons.description:
By intermittently powering on and off non-vital components, the Drone can stay on for longer.
- **Reduces** the Rotational speed of the Scan Lines of **Drones** by **-100 %**.

addons.name: Shotgun Speakers
addons.description:
Capable of directing high-frequency noises in a single direction over great distances, the Drones can focus in on one individual and distract them from danger for some time.
- Claw-Trapped Survivors no longer receive a warning sound of impending Skill Checks.

addons.name: Stereo Remote Mic
addons.description:
An upgrade that allows increased three-dimensional audio tracking.
- **Reduces** the duration of the Disabled State of **Drones** to **85 %** of its default value.

addons.name: Supercharge
addons.description:
The batteries may run a little hot, but removing the safety protocols from the cells makes them last a little longer.
- **Extends** the Battery life of **Claw Traps** by **+15 %**.

addons.name: Brown Noise Generator
addons.description:
An ominous hum disseminates from the Drone, blanketing the soundscape and making it difficult to hear anything else.
- Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the **Oblivious** **Status Effect**.

addons.name: Infrared Upgrade
addons.description:
Heat-detecting cameras focus in on high-stress individuals with pinpoint accuracy.
- The Auras of Claw-Trapped Survivors are revealed to you for **4 seconds** after they remove their **Claw-Trap**.

addons.name: Loose Screw
addons.description:
A bone-chilling rattling emanates from the Drone, and it seems like it may fall at any moment, distracting Survivors from complicated tasks.
- Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the **Exhausted** **Status Effect** for **6 seconds**.

addons.name: Powdered Glass
addons.description:
Once used on the strings used for battle kites, this powdered glass took on a much more nefarious purpose on her blade.
- Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the **Haemorrhage** and **Mangled** **Status Effects** for **70 seconds**, when hit with a Basic Attack.

addons.name: Vital Targeting Processor
addons.description:
An additional process in the Drone's programming more accurately predicts the weaknesses of potential prey.
- **Increases** the strength of the **Hindered** **Status Effect** for Claw-Trapped Survivors when detected by **Drones** by **-3 %**.

addons.name: Advanced Movement Prediction
addons.description:
Even after they leave the zone of influenced, a refined AI programme predicts with high accuracy where a person will go next.
- The Auras of newly Claw-Trapped Survivors are revealed to you for **6 seconds**.

addons.name: Geographical Readout
addons.description:
The Drones generate and communicate a detailed three-dimensional map of the terrain, making traversal easier.
- **Increases** the Action speeds of breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and of vaulting Windows by **+20 %** for **8 seconds** after deploying a **Drone**.

addons.name: Prototype Rotor
addons.description:
The cutting-edge design allows the Drone to move with razor-sharp precision.
- **Increases** the Rotational speed of the Scan Lines of **Drones** by **+10 %**.

addons.name: Randomised Strobes
addons.description:
Lights flash randomly on the ground, making it harder to find purchase on the uneven terrain.
- **Extends** the duration of the **Hindered** **Status Effect** for Claw-Trapped Survivors when detected by **Drones** by **+1 second**.

addons.name: Expired Batteries
addons.description:
The batteries on these Claw Traps have been swapped out with old alkaline batteries.
Recharging is not recommended.
- **Increases** the strength of the **Haste** **Status Effect** from Tracked Survivors by **+25 %**.
- **Reduces** the Battery life of **Claw Traps** by **-50 %**.

addons.name: Iridescent Unpublished Manuscript
addons.description:
Before he disappeared, Adriana's father had started a newer, darker manga: **Sonhadores Sombrios**.
Whenever a **Drone** enters the Disabled State, the following effects apply for **15 seconds**:
- Causes the disabled **Drone** to emit a fake Terror Radius of **32 metres**.
- Grants the **Undetectable** **Status Effect**.

"When evil is on the loose, it cannot escape from Adi Valente!" â Quote on the cover of **Adi Valente #1*

addons.name: Friendship Bracelet
addons.description:
A wide grey and red braided rope bracelet.
The inscription "F. J. S. J." can be seen, crudely written in bold black ink.
- **Extends** the Lunge duration of Feral Slashes by **+0.3 seconds**, which **increases** your Attack range.

addons.name: Mischief List
addons.description:
A list of mischievous missions to accomplish, memento of brighter days.
- **Extends** the duration of Feral Frenzy by **+2 seconds**.

addons.name: Scratched Ruler
addons.description:
A wooden ruler deeply scratched with hash marks.
- **Reduces** the Recovery time of Feral Frenzy by **-5 seconds**.

addons.name: Smiley Face Pin
addons.description:
A friendly looking, bright yellow button used as a sarcastic statement.
- Survivors suffer from the **Blindness** **Status Effect** for **60 seconds** after mending themselves.

addons.name: Defaced Smiley Pin
addons.description:
A once friendly looking, bright yellow button of a defaced smiley.
A signature icon of The Legion.
- Survivors suffer from the **Mangled** **Status Effect** for **60 seconds** after mending themselves.

addons.name: Etched Ruler
addons.description:
A wooden ruler deeply etched with the names of enemies.
- Survivors hit with a Feral Slash suffer from the **Oblivious** **Status Effect** for **60 seconds**.

addons.name: Julie's Mix Tape
addons.description:
A dark and depressing mix tape made out from mainly power ballads and gloomy melodies.
- Instantly recharges Feral Frenzy after being stunned by any means while using it.
- Unlocks an additional sound layer in your Terror Radius, enhancing it musically.
Julie's Mix Tape can be combined with any other Mix Tape Add-on to unlock multiple sound layer combos.

addons.name: Mural Sketch
addons.description:
A rough sketch of The Legion mural torn from a notebook.
- **Increases** the stack-able Movement Speed boost gained from chained Feral Slashes to **+0.3 m/s**, up to a maximum of **+1.2 m/s**.

addons.name: Never-Sleep Pills
addons.description:
Highly caffeinated tablets to make you extra sharp for exams or draining activities.
- **Extends** the duration of Feral Frenzy by **+10 seconds**.
- **Reduces** the starting Movement speed of Feral Frenzy to **4.6 m/s**.
- Grants a stack-able **+100** bonus Bloodpoints for successful Feral Slashes, up to a maximum of **+500**.

addons.name: Joey's Mix Tape
addons.description:
A mix of bangin' tracks and slammin' beats for chillaxin' when life's a bitch.
- Survivors suffer from the **Haemorrhage** **Status Effect** until fully healed after mending themselves.
- Unlocks an additional sound layer in your Terror Radius, enhancing it musically.
Joey's Mix Tape can be combined with any other Mix Tape Add-on to unlock multiple sound layer combos.

addons.name: Stolen Sketch Book
addons.description:
A sketch book with imaginative and evocative, if not slightly bizarre sketches.
- Causes Survivors hit with chained Feral Slashes to drop any carried Item.

addons.name: Stylish Sunglasses
addons.description:
Oval-shaped sunglasses that exude poise and cool.
Their colour-tinted lenses add an understated appeal.
- The Auras of Survivors mending themselves within **24 metres** of your location are revealed to you.

addons.name: Susie's Mix Tape
addons.description:
A fast and thrilling mix tape with energising songs with break-neck beats.
- **Increases** the Detection radius of Killer Instinct by **+20 metres**.
